title: Palace of Sinew
text: [[Dyrrn]]'s prison [[demiplane]] is the Palace of Sinew, a horrid site shaped from the leftover flesh and bones of the [[daelkyr]]'s sculpting. The walls of the palace undulate as air flows through them, as if the space were breathing. Dyrrn can invoke the ambient magic in this place to corrupt creatures native to Eberron, or drain their intellect until their brain shuts down.
